narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. This inspection focused on animals, facilities, medical
records, protocols, and other documents maintained by the facility.  The inspection started on 2 OCT 2018 and
finished on 3 OCT 2018. This inspection and an exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
